1. Sqlite:
cd sqlite-autoconf-3090200
./configure --prefix=<dir>
make
make install

2. openssl:
cd openssl-1.0.2d
./Configure --prefix=<dir> linux-x86_64 shared
make
make install

3. boost:
cd boost_1_59_0
./bootstrap.sh
./b2 --prefix=<dir>

4. cpp-netlib
cd cpp-netlib-0.11.2-final
mkdir cpp-netlib-build
cd cpp-netlib-build
export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=<openssl lib pkgconfig path>
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug \
      -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc \
      -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++ \
      -DBOOST_ROOT=<boost_dir> \
      -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=<dir> \
      ..
make
make install
